author: dgaudet
msg: PR#430: srm.conf-dist has a bogus IndexIgnore line.  It works, but it's
silly to include the paths.  mod_dir ignores the path prefix anyhow.

author: marc
msg: Reviewed by:	Dean Gaudet, Jim Jagielski

author: marc
msg: Reviewed by:	Dean Gaudet, Jim Jagielski

author: dgaudet
msg: Introduce ap_select to clean up SELECT_NEEDS_CAST #ifdefs everywhere.

author: dgaudet
msg: Don't redefine assert() since it's frequently, but not always a macro.
Use ap_assert.  Unix assert does an abort() which causes a core dump which
is frequently useful.  Use fprintf rather than nesting into log_unixerr.
